definitions.definition: Intention to harm or deprive in an illegal or immoral way. Desire to take pleasure in another's misfortune.
An intention to do injury to another party , which in many jurisdictions is a distinguishing factor between the crimes of murder and manslaughter .

main_definition: Intention to harm or deprive in an illegal or immoral way. Desire to take pleasure in another's misfortune.
secondary_definitions: ( law ) An intention to do injury to another party , which in many jurisdictions is a distinguishing factor between the crimes of murder and manslaughter .
